snippet: Andy Murray said on Thursday the noise created by the U.S. Open's new retractable roof over Arthur Ashe Stadium is a distraction to players and makes it difficult to react to opponents' shots....
lead_paragraph: Andy Murray said on Thursday the noise created by the U.S. Open's new retractable roof over Arthur Ashe Stadium is a distraction to players and makes it difficult to react to opponents' shots.

headline.print_headline: Murray Says Noise Under Roof a Distraction for Players
headline.main: Murray Says Noise Under Roof a Distraction for Players
